spec.title: Q3 Performance: 25% Revenue Growth Fuels Strategic Expansion

bullets: Achieved 25% revenue growth, surpassing $5M target, driven by new product launch.
Customer satisfaction scores improved 15%, elevating NPS from 7.5 to 8.6 in Q3.
Expanded into two new regions, generating $800K in additional quarterly revenue.
Reduced churn rate from 10% to 7%, enhancing customer retention and profitability.
Implemented AI-driven analytics, increasing operational efficiency by 20% across departments.
right.imagePrompt: A professional, high-resolution image of an upward trending graph overlayed with diverse business professionals analyzing growth metrics in a modern boardroom setting, bright natural light, corporate attire.

spec.notes: Start with the revenue growth highlight, then transition into customer satisfaction improvements. Emphasize the expansion and efficiency gains as key drivers of future success. Conclude with a call to action for strategic alignment in Q4 initiatives.

issues: Add altText to describe images for screen readers.
Layout undefined not in expected: title-bullets, two-column, chart
